alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 11:18AM CST until March 04 at 9:30AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tennessee River AT Florence affecting Colbert and Lauderdale Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tennessee River AT Florence. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Alabama State Highway 20 is flooded at the underpass below U.S. Highways 43 and 72. The underpass will likely be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CST Monday was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Thursday evening and continue falling to 15.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.5 feet on 07/12/1916. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
